issue.title: rotations in ray sensor pose turns into weird translations and behaviour

content.raw:
Both issues are about different problems: #509 is about the not working vertical rays and this one here is about not working rotations. If they are link to the same root cause, please describe it. Otherwise, please don't mark this issue as duplicated (and thereby solved!).

Regarding your tip: This is not really a solution for me. My small robot (kobuki, similar to create) has only one link. That means, I would need to create a joint for each sensor I attach or create extra models as Pablo mentioned in the other issues.
Both ways are not really suitable for me.
But still, thanks for the help!
content.html:
Both issues are about different problems: #509 is about the not working vertical rays and this one here is about not working rotations. If they are link to the same root cause, please describe it. Otherwise, please don't mark this issue as duplicated (and thereby solved!).

Regarding your tip: This is not really a solution for me. My small robot (kobuki, similar to create) has only one link. That means, I would need to create a joint for each sensor I attach or create extra models as Pablo mentioned in the other issues. Both ways are not really suitable for me. But still, thanks for the help!
